entries.description: Add support for configuring IPFamilies and IPFamilyPolicy for nodeport-proxy.
Add support for configuring multiple networks for vSphere.
Update Cilium CNI to 1.13.4, marking 113.0 as deprecated but kept 1.13.3 because 1.13.4 breaks IPSec support.
Fix default url configuration of Blacbox exporter.
Hetzner CSI: recreate CSIDriver to allow upgrade from 1.6.0 to 2.2.0.
Replace `irate` with `rate` for node cpu usage graphs.
